coms309.songusoid

Class ServerCommunication

  • java.lang.Object
    • coms309.songusoid.ServerCommunication

  • public class ServerCommunication
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Garrett on 10/5/2017. ServerCommunication handles the Volley code necessary to communicate with the server sending and receiving json files will be the primary method of communication

    • Method Detail

      • LoginRequest

        public void LoginRequest(org.json.JSONObject json)
        Sends a LoginRequest to the server with details contained in a JSONObject
        Parameters:
        json - JSONObject containing the username and password

      • noResponse

        public void noResponse(org.json.JSONObject json,
                       java.lang.String URL)
        Sends information to the server from the app, but expects no response
        Parameters:
        json - JSONObject which contains information to be sent to server
        URL - URL for which the information is sent to and executed

      • createAcc

        public void createAcc(org.json.JSONObject json)
        Sends details of a new account to be created to the server, and creates a Toast to let the user know if successful or not
        Parameters:
        json - contains the username and password of the account to be created

      • saveSong

        public void saveSong(org.json.JSONObject json)
        Saves a song onto the server, server will respond with success or fail On response, if successful, add the song to the profile. If failed Toast the acitvity to let the user know.
        Parameters:
        json - json containing the name of the song to save

      • loadSong

        public void loadSong(org.json.JSONObject json,
                     android.content.Context context,
                     int instrument)
        Loads a song from the server. Server will respond with success or fail On response, if successful, create a SongAlgo object and set the frequency, duration, and delay, to match the response. Then use SongCreate to generate the song and play it. If failed, Toast the activity to let the user know it failed.
        Parameters:
        json -

      • uploadSong

        public void uploadSong(org.json.JSONObject json)
        Uploads a song to the server for others to download/rate
        Parameters:
        json - file containing information to be uploaded

      • downloadSong

        public void downloadSong(org.json.JSONObject json)
